Name: Fear Thy Neighbor
Title: Law and Disorder
Desc: A former cop is moving into a close-knit neighborhood; conflict arises with the whole community.
LongDescription: A former cop is moving into a close-knit neighborhood; conflict arises with the whole community over dogs, noise, and other disturbances that keep piling on and ratcheting up until a boiling point is reached, guns are drawn, and blood is spilled.
